sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="JSM Web Svc Assign Group">82eff12e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb53</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var groupName = source.assigned_group;

	if (groupName !== "") {
		var groupEntity = client.queryEntity('sys_user_group', 'name', groupName);

		if (groupEntity !== undefined) {
			return groupEntity.sys_id.toString();
		}
	}
	
	return "";
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_web_svc_asn_group</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 12:02:49</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ac30462e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb11</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_ac30462e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb11</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 12:28:30</sys_updated_on><target_field>assignment_group</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_f58159221bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb4f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.assignment_group.name !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">assignment_groupVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Add Team</name><order>3</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias.toString();
	var teamName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(current.assignment_group.name.toString());
	
	var contentMap = {
		"team": {
			"name": teamName
		}
	};
	
	client.postToJSMAlertAPI(contentMap, "/" + alertAlias + "/teams", "alias");
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 08:39:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f58159221bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb4f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Add Team</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f58159221bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb4f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 08:40:00</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f58159221bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb4f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_4d90426e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb98
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="JSM Web Svc Assign Group">82eff12e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb53</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var alertId = source.jsm_alert_id.toString();
	var alertAlias = source.jsm_alert_alias.toString();
	var incident;
	
	if (alertId) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_id', alertId);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
			incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias', alertAlias);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
			incident.query();

			if (incident.next()) {
				return incident.sys_id;
			} else {
				log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Assign Group] Could not find an open incident with JSM alert ID [" + alertId + "] or with JSM alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
				return -1;
			}
		}
	} else if (alertAlias) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias', alertAlias);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Assign Group] Could not find an open incident with JSM alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
			return -1;
		}
	} else {
		log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Assign Group] No alert ID or alert alias supplied. Skipping.");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_web_svc_asn_group</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 12:04:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4d90426e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb98</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_4d90426e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb98</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 12:28:26</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_ba59f4ea1b483510bbc41f87b04bcb22
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.comments.getJournalEntry(1) !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">commentsVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Add Comment</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias;
	var additionalComments = current.comments.getJournalEntry(1);
	
	var contentMap = {
		"state": "Added Comment",
		"additionalComments": additionalComments,
		"incidentNumber": current.number.toString()
	};

	if (alertAlias !== "") {
		contentMap.alias = alertAlias.toString();
	} else {
		contentMap.alias = current.number.toString();
	}

	client.postToJSM(contentMap);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 06:54:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ba59f4ea1b483510bbc41f87b04bcb22</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Add Comment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ba59f4ea1b483510bbc41f87b04bcb22</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 06:56:30</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ba59f4ea1b483510bbc41f87b04bcb22"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_332ff9ea1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb63
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="JSM Web Svc Asn User">74aef1ea1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb52</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var alertId = source.jsm_alert_id.toString();
	var alertAlias = source.jsm_alert_alias.toString();
	var incident;
	
	if (alertId) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_id', alertId);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
			incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias', alertAlias);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
			incident.query();

			if (incident.next()) {
				return incident.sys_id;
			} else {
				log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Asn User] Could not find an open incident with JSM alert ID [" + alertId + "] or with JSM alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
				return -1;
			}
		}
	} else if (alertAlias) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias', alertAlias);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Asn User] Could not find an open incident with JSM alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
			return -1;
		}
	} else {
		log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Asn User] No alert ID or alert alias supplied. Skipping.");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_web_svc_asn_user</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 11:58:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>332ff9ea1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb63</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_332ff9ea1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb63</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 12:24:32</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_725595661bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb4e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias !== "" || current.number !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">stateCHANGESTO6^ORstateCHANGESTO7^EQ<item display_value="Resolved" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="6"/><item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="7"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Close Alert</name><order>2</order><priority>1</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias;
	var state = current.state.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var closeNotes = current.close_notes.toString();
	var closeCode = current.close_code.getDisplayValue().toString();
	
	var contentMap = {
		"state": state,
		"closeCode": closeCode,
		"closeNotes": closeNotes,
		"incidentNumber": current.number.toString()
	};
	
	if (alertAlias !== "") {
		contentMap.alias = alertAlias.toString();
	} else {
		contentMap.alias = current.number.toString();
	}
	
	client.postToJSM(contentMap);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 08:56:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>725595661bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb4e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Close Alert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_725595661bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb4e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 08:57:20</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=725595661bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb4e"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e078116a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb59
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user_grmember</collection><condition>current.user.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id.toString() !== "" && current.group.name !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Delete Team Member</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithJSM) {
		var user = current.user;
		var group = current.group;
		var userId = user.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id.toString();
		var groupName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(group.name);
		
		client.deleteTeamMemberFromTeamInJSM(groupName, userId, "name");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 09:10:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e078116a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb59</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Delete Team Member</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e078116a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb59</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 09:10:59</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e078116a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb59"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a0271de61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbf7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition>current.email.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Create User</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithJSM) {
		var username = current.email.toString();
		var fullname = current.name.toString();
		var businessPhone = current.phone.toString();
		var mobilePhone = current.mobile_phone.toString();
		var timezone = current.time_zone.toString();
		
		var contentMap = {
			"username": username,
			"fullName": fullname,
			"role": {
				"name": "User"
			}
		};
		
		if (timezone !== "") {
			contentMap["timeZone"] = timezone;
		}
		
		var result = client.postToJSMUserAPI(contentMap, "");
		
		if (result.getStatusCode() > 199 && result.getStatusCode() < 300) {
			var result_body = new global.JSON().decode(result.getBody());
			var userId = result_body["data"]["id"];
			
			current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id = userId;
		
			if (businessPhone !== "") {
				var contactMap = {
					"method": "voice",
					"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(businessPhone)
				};

				var addBusinessPhoneContactResult = client.postToJSMUserAPI(contactMap, "/" + username + "/contacts");

				if (addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() > 199 && addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() < 300) {
					var addBusinessPhoneContactResultBody = new global.JSON().decode(addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getBody());
					var businessPhoneContactId = addBusinessPhoneContactResultBody["data"]["id"];

					current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_business_phone_contact_id = businessPhoneContactId;
				}
			}

			if (mobilePhone !== "") {
				var contactMapMobile = {
					"method": "voice",
					"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(mobilePhone)
				};

				var addMobilePhoneContactResult = client.postToJSMUserAPI(contactMapMobile, "/" + username + "/contacts");

				if (addMobilePhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() > 199 && addMobilePhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() < 300) {
					var addMobilePhoneContactResultBody = new global.JSON().decode(addMobilePhoneContactResult.getBody());
					var mobilePhoneContactId = addMobilePhoneContactResultBody["data"]["id"];

					current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_mobile_phone_contact_id = mobilePhoneContactId;
				}
			}
			
			current.update();
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 09:05:57</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a0271de61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbf7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Create User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a0271de61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbf7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 09:05:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a0271de61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbf7"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition>current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Delete User</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithJSM) {
		var userId = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id.toString();
		var subEndpoint = "/".concat(userId);
		client.deleteUserFromJSM(subEndpoint);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 09:12:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5339d96a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb23</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Delete User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5339d96a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb23</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 09:12:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5339d96a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb23"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_8efdfd6a1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb23
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="JSM Web Svc Add Work Note">e5cd75aa1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbda</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var alertId = source.jsm_alert_id.toString();
	var alertAlias = source.jsm_alert_alias.toString();
	var incident;
	
	if (alertId) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_id', alertId);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
			incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias', alertAlias);
			incident.query();

			if (incident.next()) {
				return incident.sys_id;
			} else {
				log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Add Work Note] Could not find an incident with JSM alert ID [" + alertId + "] or with JSM alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
				return -1;
			}
		}
	} else if (alertAlias) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias', alertAlias);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Add Work Note] Could not find an incident with JSM alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
			return -1;
		}
	} else {
		log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Add Work Note] No alert ID or alert alias supplied. Skipping.");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_web_svc_add_work_note</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 11:54:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8efdfd6a1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb23</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_8efdfd6a1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb23</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 12:22:24</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_9bc255e21bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb5c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>!current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1).contains("[From JSM] ")</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">work_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Add Work Note</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias;
	var workNotes = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);

	var contentMap = {
		"state": "Added Note",
		"workNotes": workNotes,
		"incidentNumber": current.number.toString()
	};

	if (alertAlias !== "") {
		contentMap.alias = alertAlias.toString();
	} else {
		contentMap.alias = current.number.toString();
	}

	client.postToJSM(contentMap);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 08:47:31</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9bc255e21bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Add Work Note</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9bc255e21bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 08:47:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9bc255e21bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb5c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_345ab5a61b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbbb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>sample</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var body = request.body.data;
	var alertId = body.alert.alertId;
	
	gs.info("[Sample] Processing message: " + new global.JSON().encode(body));
	gs.info("[Sample] alertId: " + alertId);
	
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var alertFromJSM = client.getAlertFromJSM(alertId);
	
	gs.info("[Sample] Response to Get Alert request from JSM: " + new global.JSON().encode(alertFromJSM));
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_atrpp_jsm/jsm2sn/sample</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/sample</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 11:37:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>345ab5a61b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbbb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sample</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_345ab5a61b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbbb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 15:00:31</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="jsm2sn">50c97d661b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbbf</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_51d599a61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbbe
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.state.getDisplayValue().toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Create Alert</name><order>1</order><priority>1</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var shortDescription = current.short_description.toString();
	var priority = current.priority.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var incidentNumber = current.number.toString();
	var openedAt = current.opened_at.toString();
	var category = current.category.toString();
	var severity = current.severity.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var state = current.state.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var assignedTo = current.assigned_to.name.toString();
	var assignedToEmail = current.assigned_to.email.toString();
	var assignmentGroup = current.assignment_group.name.toString();
	var workNotes = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);
	var incidentLink = current.getLink(false);
	var sysId = current.getUniqueValue();
	var alertAlias = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias.toString();
	var configurationItem = current.cmdb_ci.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var companyName = current.company.name.toString();
	var callerName = current.caller_id.name.toString();
	var sysDomain = current.sys_domain.toString();
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	
	var contentMap = {
		"alias": incidentNumber,
		"incidentNumber": incidentNumber,
		"shortDescription": shortDescription,
		"priority": priority,
		"openedAt": openedAt,
		"category": category,
		"severity": severity,
		"state": state,
		"assignedTo": assignedTo,
		"assignedToEmail": assignedToEmail,
		"assignmentGroup": assignmentGroup,
		"workNotes": workNotes,
		"teams": client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(assignmentGroup),
		"recipients": assignedToEmail,
		"configurationItem": configurationItem,
		"companyName": companyName,
		"callerName": callerName,
		"sysDomain": sysDomain,
		"incidentLink": gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + incidentLink,
		"sysId": sysId
	};
	
	client.postToJSM(contentMap);
	current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias = incidentNumber;
	current.update();
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 08:58:31</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>51d599a61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbbe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Create Alert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_51d599a61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbbe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 08:58:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=51d599a61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbbe"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_cb8d7d6a1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbe6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="JSM Web Svc Add Alert ID">907cf52a1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbc8</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var sysId = source.servicenow_incident_sys_id.toString();
	
	var incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
	incident.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
	incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
	incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
	incident.query();
	
	if (incident.next()) {
		return sysId;
	} else {
		log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Add Alert ID] Could not find an open incident with Sys ID [" + sysId + "].");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_web_svc_add_alert_id</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 11:50:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>cb8d7d6a1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbe6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_cb8d7d6a1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbe6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 12:22:01</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_135e612e1b0c3510bbc41f87b04bcb2c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_atrpp_jsm.JSM_Client</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>JSM_Client</name><script><![CDATA[var JSM_Client = Class.create();
JSM_Client.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.apiKey = gs.getProperty('x_atrpp_jsm.api.key', '');
		this.endpoint = gs.getProperty('x_atrpp_jsm.api.url', 'https://api.atlassian.com');
		this.useAcknowledgeInsteadOfAssign = gs.getProperty('x_atrpp_jsm.use.acknowledge', false) === 'true' ? true : false;
    },
	
	postToJSM: function(contentMap) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_atrpp_jsm.JSM Webhook', 'post');
			rest.setQueryParameter("apiKey", this.apiKey);
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			var content = new global.JSON().encode(contentMap);
		
			rest.setRequestBody(content);

			gs.debug("Posting to " + rest.getEndpoint() + " content: " + content);
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")){
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
			} else{
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
			}
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	postToJSMAlertAPI: function(contentMap, subEndpoint, identifierType) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_atrpp_jsm.JSM Alert API Endpoint', 'post');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
			
			if(identifierType !== ""){
				rest.setQueryParameter("identifierType", identifierType);
			}
			
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", subEndpoint);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			
			var content = new global.JSON().encode(contentMap);
			rest.setRequestBody(content);

			gs.debug("Posting to " + rest.getEndpoint() + " content: " + content);
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")){
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
			} else{
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
			}
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	formatPhoneNumber: function(number) {
		number = number
			.replace(/\(/g, "")
			.replace(/\)/g, "")
			.replace(/\-/g, "")
			.replace(/\//g, "")
			.replace(/\+/g, "")
			.replace(/\ /g, "");
		
		if (number.length > 10) {
			number = number.substring(0, number.length - 10) + "-" + number.substring(number.length - 10, number.length);
		} else {
			number = "1-" + number;
		}
		
		return number;
	},
	
	replaceForbiddenCharacters: function(teamName) {
		teamName = teamName.replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9_.\- ]+/g, "_");
		return teamName;
	},
	
	postToWebService: function(webServiceName, body) {
		var requestUrl = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + "api/now/import/" + webServiceName;
		
		var bodyJSON = new global.JSON().encode(body);
		gs.info("[JSM_Client-postToWebService] Making request to " + requestUrl + " with content: " + bodyJSON);

		var webServiceRequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		webServiceRequest.setEndpoint(requestUrl);
		webServiceRequest.setHttpMethod('POST');
		webServiceRequest.setRequestHeader("Accept","application/json");
		webServiceRequest.setRequestHeader('Content-Type','application/json');
		webServiceRequest.setRequestBody(bodyJSON);

		return webServiceRequest.execute();
	},
	
	queryEntity: function(tableName, queryFieldName, queryValue) {
		var entity = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		entity.addQuery(queryFieldName, queryValue);
		entity.query();
		
		if (entity.next()) {
			return entity;
		} else {
			return undefined;
		}
	},
	
	getAlertFromJSM: function(alertId) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_atrpp_jsm.JSM Alert API Endpoint', 'get');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", "/" + alertId);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			
			gs.debug("Sending GetAlert request to " + rest.getEndpoint());
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
			
			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")) {
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
				return "";
			} else {
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
				return responseBody;
			}
		} catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occurred: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
    type: 'JSM_Client'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 11:16:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>135e612e1b0c3510bbc41f87b04bcb2c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM_Client</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_135e612e1b0c3510bbc41f87b04bcb2c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-06 13:46:59</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user_group</collection><condition>current.name.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Create Team</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {	
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithJSM) {
		var teamName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(current.name.toString());
		var teamDescription = current.description.toString();
		
		var contentMap = {
			"name": teamName,
			"description": teamDescription
		};
		
		client.postToJSMTeamAPI(contentMap, "" , "");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 09:01:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d4b65da61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbbb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Create Team</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d4b65da61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbbb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 09:01:52</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d4b65da61bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbbb"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_3942866e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb2b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="JSM Web Svc Close/Resolve">1fe08a2e1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb52</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var alertId = source.jsm_alert_id.toString();
	var alertAlias = source.jsm_alert_alias.toString();
	var incident;
	
	if (alertId) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_id', alertId);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
			incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias', alertAlias);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
			incident.query();

			if (incident.next()) {
				return incident.sys_id;
			} else {
				log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Close/Resolve] Could not find an open incident with JSM alert ID [" + alertId + "] or with JSM alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
				return -1;
			}
		}
	} else if (alertAlias) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias', alertAlias);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Close/Resolve] Could not find an open incident with JSM alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
			return -1;
		}
	} else {
		log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Close/Resolve] No alert ID or alert alias supplied. Skipping.");
		return -1;
	}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition>current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_user">nameVALCHANGES^ORrolesVALCHANGES^ORphoneVALCHANGES^ORmobile_phoneVALCHANGES^ORtime_zoneVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="roles" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="phone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="mobile_phone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="time_zone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Update User</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithJSM) {
		var fullname = current.name.toString();
		var businessPhone = current.phone.toString();
		var mobilePhone = current.mobile_phone.toString();
		var userId = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id.toString();
		var businessPhoneContactId = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_business_phone_contact_id.toString();
		var mobilePhoneContactId = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_mobile_phone_contact_id.toString();
		var timezone = current.time_zone.toString();
	
		var contentMap = {
			"fullName": fullname
		};
		
		if (timezone !== "") {
			contentMap["timeZone"] = timezone;
		}
		
		var result = client.patchToJSMUserAPI(contentMap, "/" + userId);
		
		if (result.getStatusCode() > 199 && result.getStatusCode() < 300) {
			if (businessPhone !== "") {
				var contactMap;
				if (businessPhoneContactId !== "") {
					contactMap = {
						"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(businessPhone)
					};
					var businessPhoneEndpoint= "/" + userId + "/contacts/" + businessPhoneContactId;

					client.patchToJSMUserAPI(contactMap, businessPhoneEndpoint);
				} else {
					contactMap = {
						"method": "voice",
						"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(businessPhone)
					};

					var addBusinessPhoneContactResult = client.postToJSMUserAPI(contactMap, "/" + userId + "/contacts");
					if (addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() > 199 && addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() < 300) {
						var addBusinessPhoneContactResultBody = new global.JSON().decode(addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getBody());
						current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_business_phone_contact_id = addBusinessPhoneContactResultBody["data"]["id"];
				
					}
				
				}
			}
			if (mobilePhone !== "") {
				var contactMapMobile;
				if (mobilePhoneContactId !== "") {
					contactMapMobile = {
						"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(mobilePhone)
					};
					var mobilePhoneEndpoint= "/" + userId + "/contacts/" + mobilePhoneContactId;

					client.patchToJSMUserAPI(contactMapMobile, mobilePhoneEndpoint);
				} else {
					contactMapMobile = {
						"method": "voice",
						"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(mobilePhone)
					};

					var addMobilePhoneContactResult = client.postToJSMUserAPI(contactMapMobile, "/" + userId + "/contacts");
					if (addMobilePhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() > 199 && addMobilePhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() < 300) {
						var addMobilePhoneContactResultBody = new global.JSON().decode(addMobilePhoneContactResult.getBody());
						current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_mobile_phone_contact_id = addMobilePhoneContactResultBody["data"]["id"];
				
					}
				}
			}
			current.update();
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 09:17:04</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>10a9dd6a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb39</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Update User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_10a9dd6a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb39</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 09:17:04</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=10a9dd6a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb39"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user_group</collection><condition>current.name.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Delete Team</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithJSM) {
		var teamName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(current.name.toString());
		client.deleteTeamFromJSM("/" + teamName, "name" );
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 09:07:34</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f918992a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbaa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Delete Team</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f918992a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbaa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 09:07:34</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f918992a1bc83510bbc41f87b04bcbaa"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_c74259e21bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb48
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user_grmember</collection><condition>current.user.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Add Team Member</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithJSM) {
		var user = current.user;
		var group = current.group;
		var userId = user.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_user_id.toString();
		var groupName = group.name;
		var teamName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(groupName);
		
		var contentMap = {
			"user": {
				"id": userId
			}
		};
		
		client.postToJSMTeamAPI(contentMap, "/" + teamName + "/members", "name");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 08:42:49</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c74259e21bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb48</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Add Team Member</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c74259e21bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb48</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 09:20:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c74259e21bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb48"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8a6411261bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb2d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.assigned_to.email.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">assigned_toVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assigned_to" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>JSM Assign Alert</name><order>4</order><priority>1</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_alert_alias.toString();
	
	if (client.useAcknowledgeInsteadOfAssign) {
		var contentMapAck = {
			"state": "Acknowledged",
			"user": current.assigned_to.email.toString(),
			"incidentNumber": current.number.toString()
		};
		
		if (alertAlias !== "") {
			contentMapAck.alias = alertAlias.toString();
		} else {
			contentMapAck.alias = current.number.toString();
		}

		client.postToJSM(contentMapAck);
	} else {
		var contentMapAssign = {
			"owner": {
				"username": current.assigned_to.email.toString()
			}
		};

		if (alertAlias !== "") {
			contentMapAssign.alias = alertAlias.toString();
		} else {
			contentMapAssign.alias = current.number.toString();
		}

		client.postToJSMAlertAPI(contentMapAssign, "/" + contentMapAssign.alias + "/assign", "alias");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 08:54:04</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8a6411261bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb2d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Assign Alert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8a6411261bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb2d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 09:19:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8a6411261bc83510bbc41f87b04bcb2d"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_0feeb1ea1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbb2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="JSM Web Svc Asn User">74aef1ea1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb52</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var userEmail = source.assigned_to;

	if (userEmail !== "") {
		var userEntity = client.queryEntity('sys_user', 'email', userEmail);

		if (userEntity !== undefined) {
			return userEntity.sys_id.toString();
		}
	}
	
	return "";
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_web_svc_asn_user</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 11:56:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0feeb1ea1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbb2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_0feeb1ea1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcbb2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 12:23:26</sys_updated_on><target_field>assigned_to</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_map_5c5346ee1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb6a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>JSM Web Svc Create</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {
	var client = new JSM_Client();
	var groupName = source.assigned_group;

	if (groupName !== "") {
		var groupEntity = client.queryEntity('sys_user_group', 'name', groupName);

		if (groupEntity !== undefined) {
			target.assignment_group = groupEntity.sys_id.toString();
		} else {
			log.warn("[JSM Web Svc Create] Unable to find group with name \"" + groupName + "\".");
		}
	}
})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_atrpp_jsm_jsm_web_svc_create</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-18 12:18:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5c5346ee1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb6a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>JSM Web Svc Create</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Service Management" source="x_atrpp_jsm">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Service Management">978385521b0cf110bbc41f87b04bcb58</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_5c5346ee1b4c3510bbc41f87b04bcb6a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 12:18:10</sys_updated_on><target_table>incident</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
